SEARCH
Module project.miniproject3
Package project.miniproject3.controller

Class WelcomeController

java.lang.Object
project.miniproject3.controller.WelcomeController
public class WelcomeController extends Object
Controller for the Welcome view of the application. Handles user interactions such as character selection, navigation, and playing sounds.

  • Constructor Details

    • WelcomeController

      public WelcomeController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller by setting up event handlers and default states for UI elements.

    • handlePlay

      public void handlePlay(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Handles the "Play" button action, transitioning to the positioning view.
      Parameters:
      event - the triggered ActionEvent
      Throws:
      IOException - if the FXML or stylesheet files are not found

    • handleContinue

      public void handleContinue(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Handles the "Continue" button action by loading a saved game.
      Parameters:
      event - the triggered ActionEvent
      Throws:
      IOException - if deserialization fails or the save file is not found

    • handleTutorial

      public void handleTutorial()
      Toggles the visibility of the tutorial image with transition effects.

    • setTransparent

      public void setTransparent()
      Sets the tutorial image view to be transparent with a fade-out and scale-out transition. The image view is hidden once the animation is complete, and mouse interactions are disabled.

    • handleCredits

      public void handleCredits()
      Handles the "Credits" button action. Currently, plays a sound when clicked but does not trigger any additional actions.

    • handleCharacter

      public void handleCharacter()
      Toggles the visibility of the character selection box with a sliding transition effect. If the box is visible, it slides out. If it's hidden, it slides in.

    • playSound

      public void playSound(String nombreSonido, float volumen)
      Plays a sound file from the specified path at the specified volume.
      Parameters:
      nombreSonido - the path to the sound file to be played
      volumen - the volume level for the sound, typically in decibels

    • bSound

      public void bSound()
      Plays a sound for a button click with a predefined file and volume.

    • startSound

      public void startSound()
      Plays the sound that signifies the start of the game with a predefined file and volume.

    • playBackgroundSound

      public void playBackgroundSound(String sound, float volumeValue)
      Plays a background sound on a loop with the specified volume, but only if the background sound has not already started.
      Parameters:
      sound - the path to the background sound file
      volumeValue - the volume level for the background sound, typically in decibels
